text:
QUESTION 43) My life is to walk this country to see if a day happy keeping the memories of the land where I spent walking through the backlands and friends that I left access in: 20 Feb. 2012 (fragment).
The letter of this song reflects identity elements that represent the
A) Appreciation of the natural characteristics of the northeastern backlands.
B) denunciation of social precariousness caused by drought.
C) Experience of displacement experienced by the migrant.
D) profound social inequality between the Brazilian regions.
E) discrimination of northeastern in large urban centers.
